mapper.select:
SELECT B.B_NO, B.B_TITLE, B.B_CONTENT, B.B_WRITE_DATE, B.B_VIEW, B.B_REPLY, B.B_RECOMMEND, B.MEMBER_NO, B.CAT_NO, M.MEET_TAGS, M.MEET_TOPIC_NAME, M.MEET_STATE, M.MEET_FIELD FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEETING M ON B.B_NO = M.B_NO
WHERE CAT_NO = 3;

SELECT t.t_mapping_no, t.tag_num, tt.tag_name FROM BOARD b INNER JOIN TAG_MAPPING t ON b.b_no = t.b_no INNER JOIN TAG tt ON t.tag_num = tt.tag_no
WHERE cat_no = 3;

SELECT B.B_NO, B.B_TITLE, B.B_CONTENT, B.B_WRITE_DATE, B.B_VIEW, B.B_REPLY, B.B_RECOMMEND, B.MEMBER_NO, B.CAT_NO, M.MEET_TAGS, M.MEET_TOPIC_NAME, M.MEET_STATE, M.MEET_FIELD FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEETING M ON B.B_NO = M.B_NO
WHERE B.B_NO = #{boardIdx};
mapper.insert: insert INTO BOARD(b_no, b_title, b_content, b_write_date, b_view, b_reply, b_recommend, member_no, cat_no) VALUES( (SELECT t.b_no+1 FROM (SELECT MAX(b_no) b_no FROM BOARD) AS t) ,#{b_title} ,#{b_content} ,CURDATE() ,0 ,0 ,0 ,4 ,3 )
